markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Invisible Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=179)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Invisible stalkers have a poor opinion of mortals due to the unsavory nature of the violent tasks summoners usually call them to the Material Plane to perform.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Invisible Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=179)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 144</row>

**Perception** +16; darkvision

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +6

**Con** +3

**Int** -2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 70

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Naturally Invisible** The invisible stalker is invisible at all times, though when it takes a hostile action of any kind, it is hidden instead of undetected until the start of its next turn, as the vague outline of its humanoid form is faintly visible for a short period of time.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 bludgeoning

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The invisible stalker deals 2d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Swift Tracker**   The invisible stalker moves at full Speed while Tracking.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-41" />
name: Invisible Stalker
